recipesJson.name: Vanilla Graham All Day
recipesJson.author: RUG_ly
recipesJson.description:
Graham cracker is something that's really important to me. As an ex-smoker graham cracker flavored eliquid is what helped me quit smoking cigarettes.

TFA Cheesecake (Graham Crust) is not a cheesecake but it is a slightly dark, sweet, buttery graham cracker and it's my favorite graham.

CAP Cereal 27 is here to give that graham tons of texture and a really pleasant honey note.

TFA Vanilla Bean Ice Cream gives us our vanilla note with a slight creamy texture. If you're pepper taster (I'm sorry) LB Vanilla Ice Cream at 2% is a fine sub for this note.

FA Marshmallow smooths out the edges of the recipe adding to the mouth feel and giving the flavor some sticky sweetness.

CAP Super Sweet is optional here as always but I definitely recommend including it in this mix.

Watch the Video Here:
https://youtu.be/SAXu7CxTIC0

reviews.text: This is my first taste of a Rug_ly recipe, With that being said I think this recipe, which is one of my favorite profiles, is tasty. It has the graham and the vanilla off the shake. If this was edible I would probably gain 50 more pounds eating it. I can hardly wait for the 3 day steep, if there is any left.
